name: K.js
description: Self-hosted high frequency automated market making cryptocurrency trading platform in node.js, angular, typescript and c++

scripts.diff: _() { echo $2 $3 version: `git rev-parse $1`; }; git remote update && _ @ Local running && _ @{u} Latest remote && npm run changelog
scripts.latest: _() { git rev-parse $1; }; npm run diff && test `_ @` != `_ @{u}` && exec npm run reinstall || echo Already running latest `_ @{u}` version!
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf app && git fetch && git merge FETCH_HEAD && npm install && npm run test && forever restartall && exec npm run test-stunnel
scripts.postreinstall: # ..done! Please refresh the GUI if is currently opened in your browser.
scripts.preinstall: sudo rm -rf /usr/local/etc/stunnel && sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/etc/stunnel/ && exec npm run install-packages
scripts.postinstall: npm run compile-server && npm run compile-client && npm run compile-public && npm run compile-bundle
scripts.install-packages: test -n "$(command -v apt-get)" && sudo apt-get -y install g++ build-essential automake libtool libxml2 libxml2-dev zlib1g-dev openssl stunnel $(test -n "$(command -v mongo)" || echo mongodb) || (test -n "$(command -v yum)" && sudo yum -y install gcc-c++ automake autoconf libtool libxml2 libxml2-devel zlib-devel openssl stunnel $(test -n "$(command -v mongo)" || echo mongodb)) || (test -n "$(command -v brew)" && (xcode-select --install || :) && brew install automake autoconf libxml2 openssl stunnel $(test -n "$(command -v mongo)" || echo mongodb)) && (sudo mkdir -p /data/db/ && sudo chown `id -u` /data/db && npm run compile-quickfix) && openssl s_client -showcerts -connect fix.gdax.com:4198 < /dev/null | openssl x509 -outform PEM > fix.gdax.com.pem && sudo mv fix.gdax.com.pem /usr/local/etc/stunnel/ && exec npm run test-stunnel
scripts.compile-server: node-gyp rebuild && tsc --alwaysStrict -t ES6 -m commonjs --outDir app src/server/*.ts src/server/*/*.ts src/share/*.ts
scripts.compile-client: tsc --alwaysStrict --experimentalDecorators -t ES6 -m commonjs --outDir app/pub/js src/client/*.ts src/share/*.ts
scripts.compile-bundle: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ babili es2015 ] ] app/pub/js/client/main.js app/pub/js/lib/*.js | uglifyjs > app/pub/js/client/bundle.min.js
scripts.compile-quickfix: mkdir -p build && cd build && (test -f /usr/local/lib/libquickfix.so || test -f /usr/local/lib/libquickfix.dylib) || (rm -rf quickfix-v* *.tar.gz* && wget https://github.com/quickfix/quickfix/archive/$npm_package_config_quickfix.tar.gz && tar -zxvf v*.tar.gz && cd quickfix-v* && ./bootstrap && ./configure && make && sudo make install && sudo cp config.h /usr/local/include/quickfix/ && (test -n "$(command -v ldconfig)" && sudo ldconfig || :))
scripts.startall: ls -1 etc/*.json | cut -d / -f2 | grep -v ^_ | exec xargs -I % npm start --$npm_package_name:config=%
scripts.start: npm run test-compile && forever start --uid $npm_package_config_config -a -l /dev/null K.js $npm_package_config_config && exec npm run test-stunnel
scripts.test-compile: test -d app || npm $(test -d node_modules && echo run post)install
scripts.test-stunnel: test -z "$SKIP_STUNNEL$(ps axu | grep stunnel | grep -v grep)" && exec stunnel dist/K-stunnel.conf || :
scripts.send-cov: cd test && cat coverage/lcov.info | codacy-coverage && istanbul-coveralls

author: Michael Grosner
